name: Uptogo.net
overview:
Uptogo.net, is an on-line platform for creative professionals. Uptogo.net is a revolutionary sharing platform in which creative agencies and freelances can communicate ideas and present design work to their clients in a secure online environment.

1 - A collaborative platform In a just a few steps you can give system access to a group of users involved in a creative project.

2 - Share files You can share creative files with your clients without the hassle or uncertainty of sending emails with large attachments. Once a file has been uploaded, it can be accessed by whichever users is allowed.

3 - Creative Review One or more client users can assess your creative work and choose to either make comments directly on the visual or in the body of an email sent through the Uptogo system. Each comment is traceable and gets automatically archived, as do all versions of any visual that gets shared over the platform.

4 - Approval online Once the review process is complete and the client is satisfied with the creative work, they can indicate their approval in the Uptogo program. So that no time is wasted, your agency will be immediately notified of this approval by a system-generated email.
